com.ubudu.iot.ble

Interface BleDeviceFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DongleFilter

    public interface BleDeviceFilter
    Created by julien on 4/26/17. Filter interface for finding particular BluetoothDevice among all discovered Bluetooth devices.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isCorrect(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device, int rssi, byte[] scanResponse)
      This method returns a boolean flag indicating that given Bluetooth device is the one that should be accepted.

    • Method Detail

      • isCorrect

        boolean isCorrect(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
                  int rssi,
                  byte[] scanResponse)
        This method returns a boolean flag indicating that given Bluetooth device is the one that should be accepted.
        Parameters:
        device - the device detected by the DiscoveryManager
        rssi - detected device signal strength indicator
        scanResponse - byte scan response
        Returns:
        true if the BLE device should be accepted by the DiscoveryManager
